Literature.Title: Novel BRICHOS-related Defensin-like Antimicrobial Peptide from the Marine Polychaeta Arenicola marina
Literature.Author: Safronova VN, Panteleev PV, Kruglikov RN, Bolosov IA, Finkina EI, Ovchinnikova TV

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis VKM B-886(MIC=0.25µM),Bacillus subtilis VKM B-886(MIC=2µM),Bacillus licheniformis VKM B-511(MIC=0.25µM),Bacillus licheniformis VKM B-511(MIC=1µM),Bacillus mycoides VKM B-814(MIC=8µM),Bacillus mycoides VKM B-814(MIC=8µM),Mycobacterium phlei VKM Ac-1291(MIC=0.5µM),Mycobacterium phlei VKM Ac-1291(MIC=4µM),Micrococcus luteus VKM B-1314(MIC=4µM),Micrococcus luteus VKM B-1314(MIC=>32µM),Candida albicans ATCC 18804(MIC=16µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=16µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>32µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=>32µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=>32µM),Enterobacter cloacae 4172(MIC=>32µM),Acinetobacter baumannii 2675(MIC=>32µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>32µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>32µM),Mycobacterium smegmatis mc2-155(MIC=>32µM)
